name: Kataboosis
description:
Kataboosis is a little platformer 2D ! A tiny ghost is lost in hell and he's looking for his memory to find peace.

This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2021

Twitter Team : 

@WeriaTenshi : Level Design

@Eskahaine : Gameplay Programmer
